Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two students using a string telephone to communicate.
The student can illustrate the path the sound takes through the string and cups.
The student can show that the string is tight between the cups to allow sound to travel.
The student can depict how the cup acts as a receiver and transmitter of sound.
The student can include details that show how the string telephone allows communication over a distance.
The student can indicate that technology is used to solve the problem of long-distance communication.
